CARD-FUMBLE-RANGED-1-TEXT: You are unable to make ranged attacks for the next 1d6 rounds.
CARD-FUMBLE-RANGED-2-TEXT: For 3 rounds, you must spend a full round action to make a single attack.
CARD-FUMBLE-RANGED-3-TEXT: For 3 rounds, you take an additional -2 penalty on ranged attacks for each ally in melee combat with your target.
CARD-FUMBLE-RANGED-4-TEXT: You compensate for a breeze which isn't there. You take -2 penalty on ranged attack rolls for 3 rounds.
CARD-FUMBLE-RANGED-5-TEXT: You move backward 1 square and fall %STATUS-PRONE=prone%.
CARD-FUMBLE-RANGED-6-TEXT: You are %STATUS-STUNNED=stunned% for 1 round (%SAVE-FUMBLE=Str saving throw negates%).
CARD-FUMBLE-RANGED-7-TEXT: Your attack hits the nearest allied animal or mount.
CARD-FUMBLE-RANGED-8-TEXT: You use twice as much ammunition on this attack.
CARD-FUMBLE-RANGED-10-TEXT: You take a -1 penalty on attack rolls for 1d4 rounds or until you score a critical hit.
CARD-FUMBLE-RANGED-11-TEXT: Your attack hits the nearest ally and is a critical threat. You must roll to confirm the critical hit.
CARD-FUMBLE-RANGED-12-TEXT: You provoke attacks of opportunity from all threatening foes.
CARD-FUMBLE-RANGED-13-TEXT: If using a projectile weapon it does not function. Spend 1 standard action to clear.
CARD-FUMBLE-RANGED-14-TEXT: The attack deals damage to you instead of the target.
CARD-FUMBLE-RANGED-15-TEXT: If you made a thrown attack, you hit the target, but the weapon ends up in the target's possession.
CARD-FUMBLE-RANGED-16-TEXT: You can only take a move action next round.
CARD-FUMBLE-RANGED-20-TEXT: All your attacks have a 50% miss chance for 1 round.
CARD-FUMBLE-RANGED-21-TEXT: All attack rolls beyond the first ranged increment have triple the normal distance penalty for 3 rounds.
CARD-FUMBLE-RANGED-22-TEXT: All targets with cover gain an additional +4 bonus to AC against you for 3 rounds.
CARD-FUMBLE-RANGED-23-TEXT: Your attack hits your ally closest to the target.
CARD-FUMBLE-RANGED-24-TEXT: You take a -4 penalty on all attack rolls for 1 round.
CARD-FUMBLE-RANGED-25-TEXT: You take 1d2 points of %ABILITY-DEX=Dex% %ABILITY-DAMAGE=damage% and your speed is reduced by half %UNTIL-HEALED=until healed%.
CARD-FUMBLE-RANGED-26-TEXT: If attack was made with a thrown weapon, the weapon travels 5 times its range increment in a random direction.
CARD-FUMBLE-RANGED-27-TEXT: For the next 3 rounds, you have a +1 bonus on attack rolls, but you %STATUS-RESTRAINED=restrained%.
CARD-FUMBLE-RANGED-28-TEXT: You lose your %ABILITY-DEX=Dex% bonus on attack rolls for 3 rounds.
CARD-FUMBLE-RANGED-29-TEXT: Your shot ricochets and hits you near the eye. You are %STATUS-BLINDED=blinded% for 1 round.
CARD-FUMBLE-RANGED-30-TEXT: You take -4 penalty on all attacks with this weapon until repaired (DC 20 Craft check).
CARD-FUMBLE-RANGED-31-TEXT: Your weapon (not ammunition) takes 1d6 %OBJECT-DAMAGE=points of damage%, ignoring hardness.
CARD-FUMBLE-RANGED-33-TEXT: You become %STATUS-RESTRAINED=restrained% in your gear until you spend a standard action to free yourself.
CARD-FUMBLE-RANGED-37-TEXT: Your ammunition falls from its container and takes 1d6 rounds to gather up.
CARD-FUMBLE-RANGED-42-TEXT: Your weapon is destroyed (%SAVE-FUMBLE=Dex saving throw negates%). %OBJECT-DAMAGE=Magic weapons use their own save bonus% (See Pathfinder's Core Rulebook 538).
CARD-FUMBLE-RANGED-44-TEXT: If attack was made with a bow or crossbow, the string breaks and requires 1d3 round to fix.
CARD-FUMBLE-RANGED-45-TEXT: If you made a thrown attack, you throw a random object from your gear.
CARD-FUMBLE-RANGED-46-TEXT: You take a -2 penalty on all ranged attack rolls for 1d4 minutes.
CARD-FUMBLE-RANGED-48-TEXT: The attack deals damage to you instead of the target.
CARD-FUMBLE-RANGED-49-TEXT: Reroll attack against creature nearest the target (yourself excluded).
CARD-FUMBLE-RANGED-50-TEXT: The attack hits you and is a critical threat. You must roll to confirm the critical hit.
CARD-FUMBLE-RANGED-52-TEXT: You take -2 penalty to AC for 1d4 rounds.
